attributes.action: remove the right of criminals to sue for damages if injured in the course of committing a crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone breaking the law should not be able to use the law to gain compensation for injury or loss sustained whilst engaged in an unlawful activity. As it stands, victims of crime can be caused further loss by being sued.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the right of criminals to sue for damages if injured in the course of committing a crime."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12190.asp

Prime Minister's Office
